lead_paragraph: Interviews reveal unwelcome advances, a shrewd reliance on ambition, and unsettling workplace conduct over decades.

byline.contributor: Deborah Acosta and Nicholas Casey contributed reporting, and Kitty Bennett contributed research.
byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MEGAN TWOHEY

headline.print_headline: Crossing the Line: Trump’s Private Conduct With Women
headline.main: Crossing the Line: How Donald Trump Behaved With Women in Private

snippet: Interviews reveal unwelcome advances, a shrewd reliance on ambition, and unsettling workplace conduct over decades.
abstract: Interviews with dozens of women who have interacted with presumed Republican presidential nominee Donald J Trump in business, social and romantic settings, reveal history of  inappropriate behavior and unsettling workplace conduct on his part; accounts paint complex picture of man prone to contradictory mix of lewd and gentlemanly and behavior from man who also made his power and control clear.
